Replace.Text: Wu Ding will do his best to help!
Wu's practice is not enough, please find another job~
Do you want to work with Wu to eradicate all evil in the world?
With you as my destined partner, Wu Ke is full of confidence!
Wu Ding will practice well and gain your approval!
Those who are about to fight will all march forward in formation!
Rampant and evil, let the Ten Stars in Wu's hand put an end to your evil deeds!
Are you all practicing with Wu? Come in, come in~
(Stretching out his palm) Wu is in seclusion and meditating, please don't disturb him!
This is a copy of the "Yuan Dian Manuscript". Reading it in your spare time will surely enlighten you.
How dare you speak rudely to Wu?
Wu Ding and you will never coexist!
Stranger coming from afar, Jinwu is the son of destiny who is here to subdue demons and monsters. Why have you come here?
It's less than a hundred steps ahead and you will reach Xuheng. Would you like to follow Wu and take a look?
Oh! I have never seen such a beautiful city!
Wu You suggested that you point out the way forward for Wu, and Wu can exorcise evil spirits for you.

Evil spirits are everywhere in the world. It may be difficult to wipe them out completely with Wu's strength alone. Follow Wu and his group of heroes to fight for justice and bring peace to the world!
Wu warns you, don't cause trouble!
Get away quickly!
The expansion of your power has already affected Wu!
In this case, Wu will also fight back!
The evil spirits are doing evil, can you help Wu to deal with it?
Then let Wu deal with them himself.
Oh... I'm almost getting dizzy from listening to this, take a break...
(Sigh) Oh...
Teacher... Wu's experience... has not yet...
Great! Thank you!
It's okay, maybe next time
Oh! Could this be the legendary primordial power?
Your scientific research level makes Jinwu very satisfied
Tianyuan Divine Realm--Ten Yao
Divine Realm Tianyuan
Golden Crow
Qiankangenzhenxunlikundui
Penglai Swordsmanship

After creating a capital, you will immediately gain Jinwu and Lingguang. Upgrading units will not end their turns. All units ignore the [ICON_Movement] movement penalty for terrain and crossing rivers. You can [ICON_Movement] after attacking. You can see through terrain and landforms.

Wu figured it out. Wu's mission is not to "defeat evil spirits", but to subdue demons and punish evil! Even if one "evil spirit" falls, there are still tens of millions of evil spirits similar to "evil spirits" that harm the world. Wu wants to use his own power to eliminate evil spirits in the world! - Jinwu
Intelligent and studious
Prefers civilizations with high research values
